Company: Berks County Sheriff's Office via contractor Canon Technology Solutions
Description of incident: A confidential list of some              of the County's 25,000 gun permit holders was exposed on the Web by              the contractor that is developing a Web-based computer records program              for the Sheriff's Office. Personal information included names, addresses              and SSNs.  UPDATE             (10/6/06): The Berks County solicitor's office says the entire list              of more than 25,000 gun permit holders was exposed.
